title: Endless Clouds Is Partnering With Immutable
content:
Endless Clouds and Immutable Partner to Bring Two Major Titles to Market From 2024 Onwards

This partnership brings Endless Clouds’ highly anticipated titles Treeverse and Capsule Heroes to the Immutable zkEVM chain, powered by Polygon, and projected for mainnet launch early in 2024.

Future NFT and token integration will be powered by Immutable Passport, a single sign-on solution that eases the onboarding of new players gaming on-chain. Passport radically simplifies managing gamer’s identities and digital assets across games.

“The goal of Endless Clouds is to bring digital ownership to gamers. There are 2 parts to this: a good game, and seamless integration. A chain is a partner that helps solve the latter while our team can focus on production.”—Loopify

Treeverse is an immersive MMORPG that transports players to the mystical city of Lorwick. Here, gamers can explore a rich, detailed world, engage in intense battles against formidable monsters, gather rare resources, and craft powerful equipment. The game's diverse gameplay elements promise an unparalleled experience that balances thrilling adventure with strategic depth.

Capsule Heroes breaks new ground as a PvP brawler, inviting players to team up with friends and dive into various game modes, including Occupy, Team Deathmatch, and Survival. The game features a plethora of unique skins, allowing players to customize their characters and stand out in the heat of battle. Each match is a test of skill, strategy, and teamwork, offering endless excitement and replayability.

“Treeverse and Capsule Heroes are highly anticipated titles and we’re confident that their decision to leverage Immutable’s platform will elevate the gamer experience across the board.”

“We want to create the most seamless experience possible for players and developers interacting with Immutable. Endless Clouds and its suite of games will now have access to leading technology in the space, creating a frictionless experience for both new and experienced players, increasing activity and participation for both titles.”

— Robbie Ferguson, Immutable President & Co-Founder

FAQ

Will I have to bridge my assets?

You do not need to do anything with your assets. The 3 collections in the Endless Clouds ecosystem (Nftrees, Plots, Timeless) will remain on ETH unless stated otherwise. Do not fall for any scams.

What does this partnership entail?

The partnership is for the eventual NFTs that will be tradeable in both games when the time is right. Future assets earned in-game, purchased directly from the store, or any other additional collections launched will most likely reside on the Immutable zkEVM chain.

What does this mean for Treeverse and Capsule Heroes?

Users playing the games will have the option to log in with Immutable Passport closer to the official launch and/or any notable game launches. Game design will not change. This partnership is to make future Web3 integration seamless as an add-on.

Why Immutable and not others?

The decision came down to many variables, from the final tech solution to how many things we can delegate to a partner, connections that help with production, and more. Rather than another chain being bad or good, we simplified it to what fits our needs the best. This post by Loopify goes a bit more in-depth into the reasoning behind picking a chain.
